name: you just don't get stars like these back home
name_original: you just don't get stars like these back home
description:
Made for the Eco Jam #1! The theme was pollution, and I made a stargazing simulator about light pollution ^^ Explore a campground and night and try to find the darkest spot, so you can see the most stars in the sky.

Controls:

Move - WASD + Mouse

Interact - E

Stargaze - R

Pause - Esc

-----

I know it's annoying to have to download stuff, and I really tried to make this for WebGL, but there were tons of issues, it was performing way worse, and overall in the end I just decided to only make an exe build - I hope you'll still take the time to download it and give it a go! This is my first ever 3D game, and I'm pretty happy with how it turned out, so yeah I'd appreciate it if you gave it a go uwu

I had some more ideas that I didn't have time to implement during the jam, but I'll try to get an updated FINAL version online as soon as possible :D stay tuned and thanks for playing <3
